column2: (let* ((base (make-temp-file "neovm-file-in-dir-" t)) (dir (expand-file-name "dir" base)) (out (expand-file-name "out" base)) (inside (expand-file-name "inside.txt" dir)) (outside (expand-file-name "outside.txt" out))) (make-directory dir t) (make-directory out t) (with-temp-buffer (insert "inside") (write-region nil nil inside)) (with-temp-buffer (insert "outside") (write-region nil nil outside)) (prog1 (list (file-in-directory-p inside dir) (file-in-directory-p outside dir) (file-in-directory-p dir dir) (file-in-directory-p (expand-file-name "missing.txt" dir) dir)) (delete-file inside) (delete-file outside) (delete-directory dir) (delete-directory out) (delete-directory base)))

(let* ((base (make-temp-file "neovm-file-in-dir-link-" t)) (dir (expand-file-name "dir" base)) (out (expand-file-name "out" base)) (link (expand-file-name "link" dir))) (make-directory dir t) (make-directory out t) (make-symbolic-link out link t) (prog1 (list (file-in-directory-p (expand-file-name "x.txt" link) dir) (file-in-directory-p (expand-file-name "x.txt" link) out)) (delete-file link) (delete-directory dir) (delete-directory out) (delete-directory base)))

(let* ((base (make-temp-file "neovm-file-in-dir-eval-" t)) (dir (expand-file-name "dir" base)) (inside (expand-file-name "inside.txt" dir))) (make-directory dir t) (with-temp-buffer (insert "inside") (write-region nil nil inside)) (prog1 (let ((default-directory (file-name-as-directory base))) (file-in-directory-p "dir/inside.txt" "dir")) (delete-file inside) (delete-directory dir) (delete-directory base)))
